name: Gentleman Burglar Academy
description:
2D Puzzle platformer designed to teach player about logic gates by using them to break into safes.

Created for 4th Extra Credits game jam.  I had to fix few bugs, so I release after the jam.

move and jump with arrows or wsad

F: take wire

G: plant wire

H: plant electric gate

T: unplug wire/ reset gate

R: switch weapon
